prTitle: feat: create card, hero, gallery, and lightbox component styles
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented comprehensive CSS component styles for the Donkey Website foundation. This completes task-donkey-website-feat-css-foundation-7 by creating four key component stylesheets:

### Components Implemented

**üé¥ Card Component (`card.css`)**
- Responsive grid layouts (1/2/3 columns across breakpoints)
- Breed cards with image, title, content areas and hover effects
- General cards for overview/feature sections
- Smooth animations and accessibility support

**ü¶∏ Hero Component (`hero.css`)**
- Full-width hero sections with responsive background images
- Dark overlay for text readability
- Mobile-first responsive design (60vh to 80vh height)
- Call-to-action button styling and focus states

**üñºÔ∏è Gallery Component (`gallery.css`)**
- Responsive image grid layouts (1/2/3/4 columns)
- Lightbox integration with zoom indicators
- Multiple layout variants (standard, masonry, featured)
- Image loading states and error handling

**üí° Lightbox Component (`lightbox.css`)**
- Full-screen modal overlay with dark backdrop
- Centered image display with responsive sizing
- Navigation controls and keyboard support
- Smooth open/close animations

### Key Features

‚úÖ **Mobile-first responsive design** - All components adapt from mobile (375px) to desktop (1400px+)
‚úÖ **CSS custom properties** - Uses CSS variables for consistent theming
‚úÖ **Accessibility compliance** - Focus states, ARIA support, reduced motion support
‚úÖ **Performance optimized** - Efficient animations, lazy loading support
‚úÖ **Cross-browser compatibility** - Modern CSS with fallbacks

### Technical Implementation

- **1,395 lines** of production-ready CSS across 4 files
- **Mobile-first breakpoints**: 640px, 1024px, 1400px
- **Accessibility features**: High contrast support, reduced motion, focus management
- **Print styles** included for all components
- **Test file** created to validate implementation

### Files Created

- `src/styles/components/card.css` - Card layouts and breed cards
- `src/styles/components/hero.css` - Hero sections with background images
- `src/styles/components/gallery.css` - Responsive image galleries
- `src/styles/components/lightbox.css` - Modal image viewer
- `test.html` - Component testing page

All acceptance criteria met:
- ‚úÖ card.css provides card component with image, title, and content areas
- ‚úÖ hero.css implements full-width hero with background image support
- ‚úÖ gallery.css creates responsive grid layout for images
- ‚úÖ lightbox.css styles modal overlay with centered image display
- ‚úÖ All components respond appropriately to mobile and desktop breakpoints

Closes #15
